title: Episode 179: Valley Girls with Kathy Wang
itunes:title: Episode 179: Valley Girls with Kathy Wang
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discover the book that would combine them in book form and then Kathy Wang, author of Impostor Syndrome, joins them to talk about making her own face oils, transitioning from Silicon Valley to author and back, and why people bother fight...
description:
Kate and Doree discover the book that would combine them in book form and then Kathy Wang, author of Impostor Syndrome, joins them to talk about making her own face oils, transitioning from Silicon Valley to author and back, and why people bother fighting on Twitter.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
